body:
I then ejaculated in my pants, wetting my Ben 10 pajama's pants almost completely. Confused by the whole thing, I was in shock. That's when I heard a soft female voice, really close to my ear.

"Thanks for the meal."

But no one was there.

So there was I, on a Sunday night. Windows closed for the night was stone cold. I did not live alone, I was with my parents still. To have full privacy I locked my room, as per usual. Went to sleep, well protected under my Ben 10 blanket.

As I tried to sleep I felt a blow of cold air hit me. "But how? I am under my Ben 10 blanket, my windows are closed!" I thought. Got up to check if my windows were really closed. They were.

Puzzled, I laid on my bed once again, trying to reach my peaceful slumber. But the blows of cold wind kept hitting me. The cold reached my cheeks and I felt as if it was gently caressing me. Although my cheeks were stone cold I felt oddly warm and cozy.

The blows of cold wind kept trickling down my body until they reached my pelvic area. Suddenly, I feel like ice circling around my penis. From my glans to the base, it's as if my penis is covered in cold water. The circling sensation keeps getting more intense every second. I naturally got hard.
i was gonna say "repost" but hey, there is new stuff, so thanks!
post nut clarity gotta be the baddest villain in my life
